body:
Hello,

Today marks a day where a few things have happened, namely 3; it comes with promotions and a retirement. As early as today, I got a message on steam by Gray (though most of you know him as Astronis) about his position as a moderator and as a map developer. He is taking leave from both moderator and head map developer ranks. This means that he will remain as a mapdev, but the position as head map developer would transfer. He has entrusted me (Tanpopo/Para) to run the map development team, so as so I will try to steer maps in my own way. It's unfortunate that he's going from those, but he is still going to be around; maybe a bit less, however. I want to say that he is a very passionate person and one of the best people that I've ever connected myself with, and this "leave" is for a very good reason. Ily gray. <3

As well as this (though a thread may be posted soon by him himself), MonsieurStar/FlufflesSub has decided to retire the team. He will no longer be a map developer, but he is part of the family when he got in. As I said in steam, he's in the family but retiring is seen as moving away. He's still with us and I hope that all of us continue to respect him and treat him with the best wishes for what he does in the future.

So, as a recap; Astronis has retired as a moderator and head mapdev, I am now the charge of head map dev, and Star has decided to leave. 

Post any further questions or grievance below.
body_tagged:

As early as today, I got a message on steam by Gray (though most of you know him as Astronis) about his position as a moderator and as a map developer. He is taking leave from both moderator and head map developer ranks. This means that he will remain as a mapdev, but the position as head map developer would transfer. He has entrusted me (Tanpopo/Para) to run the map development team, so as so I will try to steer maps in my own way. It's unfortunate that he's going from those, but he is still going to be around; maybe a bit less, however. I want to say that he is a very passionate person and one of the best people that I've ever connected myself with, and this "leave" is for a very good reason. Ily gray. <3

As well as this (though a thread may be posted soon by him himself), MonsieurStar/FlufflesSub has decided to retire the team. He will no longer be a map developer, but he is part of the family when he got in. As I said in steam, he's in the family but retiring is seen as moving away. He's still with us and I hope that all of us continue to respect him and treat him with the best wishes for what he does in the future.

So, as a recap; Astronis has retired as a moderator and head mapdev, I am now the charge of head map dev, and Star has decided to leave. 

Post any further questions or grievance below.
title: Rearrangements in the Mapdev Team

replies.body: You'll do great Para!(: As for Evo, thanks for all that you've done for the server, moderating and managing the map dev team, we'll miss you (Batch Buddies 5ever)<3 And Star, thanks for everything you've done for the server and what you've contributed to the Map Developing team<3

replies.body: To all the mapdevs, thank you for all the hard work you've put into the server. And to Astronis, you've been a really great moderator. It'll be sad to see you leave the team. <3
replies.body_tagged: To all the mapdevs, thank you for all the hard work you've put into the server. And to Astronis, you've been a really great moderator. It'll be sad to see you leave the team. <3

replies.body: Wow, well thank you Gray for all you've done for us and being a great part of the community. Thanks again to Star for being able to truly be a part of the Mapdev team and it's sad to see you go. Gl as head Mapdev as well, Para.  Gl to all in whatever the future holds, with us or without! :)
